welcome_message_body: Welcome to Manhattan, where the vibrant energy of the city never sleeps and the iconic skyline will take your breath away. Get ready to immerse yourself in the diverse culture, world-class dining, and endless entertainment this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Manhattan has to offer!

restaurants.name: Gallagher's Pub
restaurants.description: Gallagher's Pub is a restaurant located in Manhattan.

restaurants.name: Rosati's Pizza
restaurants.description: Rosati's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Manhattan.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Manhattan.

restaurants.name: Pizza For U
restaurants.description: Pizza For U is a pizzeria located in Manhattan.

restaurants.name: The Manhattan Firehouse Grill
restaurants.description: The Manhattan Firehouse Grill is a theme restaurant located in Manhattan.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport houses the check-in counters, security checkpoints, and gates for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines and features duty-free shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international airlines, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest at JFK and serves a mix of domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international airlines and features a wide range of shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic and international airlines and features a variety of amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport is the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Republic Field Airport is used for private and charter flights, as well as some cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
